product_name: Deuter Compact EXP 10 SL Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The Compact EXP 10 SL sits close to your back while using the Airstripes ventilated back system to promote airflow that keeps you comfortable on bike commutes and weekend rides.
